translated: Raymond Queneau born in Le Havre February 21, 1903 and died in Paris October 25, 1976, is a novelist, poet, playwright French, co-founder of the literary group Oulipo.
original: Raymond Queneau né au Havre le 21 février 1903 et mort à Paris le 25 octobre 1976, est un romancier, poète, dramaturge français, cofondateur du groupe littéraire Oulipo.
